Entry.HWD: 11/1/1/Present Perfect Simple with just, yetand already

GapFillDropdown.Title: Present Perfect Simple with just, yet and already
GapFillDropdown.ContentGapFillDropdown:
1. Have you finished your homework alreadyjust?
2. They have just yet been to Turkey.
3. I don't know when I am leaving alreadyyet.
4. He needs a coffee. He has just already woken up.
5. You can't come in yetjust. It isn't ready.
6. They've already yet painted the kitchen.
7. She hasn't paid for the meal justyet.
8. I've already yet spoken to the Managing Director.
9. I have just yet got my results. I passed!
10. She has yet already arrived in Baghdad.
